name: init_store
body: let s = & mut ctx . accounts . store ;
s . merchant = ctx . accounts . merchant . key () ;
s . score = s . score . rotate_right (2) . wrapping_mul (3) . wrapping_add (13) ;

name: payout
body: let ix = system_instruction :: transfer (& ctx . accounts . store . key () , & ctx . accounts . customer . key () , amount) ;
let bump = * ctx . bumps . get ("store") . ok_or (error ! (E :: MissingBump)) ? ;
let seeds : & [& [u8]] = & [b"store" , ctx . accounts . merchant . key . as_ref () , ctx . accounts . store . mint . as_ref () , & [bump] ,] ;
invoke_signed (& ix , & [ctx . accounts . store . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . customer . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . system_program . to_account_info () ,] , & [seeds] ,) ? ;

fields.name: store
fields.attribute: # [account (init , payer = merchant , space = 8 + 32 + 32 + 8 , seeds = [b"store" , merchant . key () . as_ref () , mint . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: mint
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: 実運用では Mint 型を推奨"]

fields.name: store
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"store" , merchant . key () . as_ref () , store . mint . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]
